程序包 org.giiwa.dao

类 Helper

java.lang.Object
org.giiwa.dao.Helper
所有已实现的接口:
Serializable
public final class Helper extends Object implements Serializable
The Helper Class is utility class for all database operation.

    static final class 
    Helper.V
    Values in SQL, used to insert or update data both RDS and Mongo

    static class 
    Helper.W
    the W Class used to create SQL "where" conditions
    this is for RDS and Mongo Query.
